website_summaries.verdict: This is our recommendation if you want to save time and get yourself a sturdy, solid piece.
pros: This box spring has a highly durable steel construction and doesn't require any assembly

customer_reviews.title: So much better!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, exactly what we wanted/needed to replace our broken wooden foundation that came with our foam mattress. Excellent quality and build so far and we are very happy to have a good sturdy foundation to put our mattress on again. Really glad we went with this one over another wood or some of the other flimsier options here.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Rhyne Jr

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and sturdy box spring, no bed frame needed
customer_reviews.text: This box spring was a breeze for my boyfriend to set up. It's nice that it comes in two pieces since as a California King size box spring, each side seems quite heavy and sturdy. I put it right on my hardwood floor with half of it on a rug and put my new mattress on top of it. It's virtually noiseless and a huge improvement over my noisy metal bed frame. Picture shown has my mattress on top of it.
customer_reviews.author: Mochi

customer_reviews.title: big things, little packages...
customer_reviews.text: crazy that this giant box spring came in such a small box! for sure a team lift up our flight and a half stairs. with this, our memory foam and our bed base, it is almost 3 feet high! amazing! pretty quiet and quite different from traditional coiled box springs. i am looking forward to much more time in bed!
customer_reviews.author: Kat Facepunch

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. This thing comes in a box that is about half the length and width of a queen size mattress and only abut 3-4 inches deep. We were skeptical. Once we opened the box, followed the easy instructions, it expanded into a very stable box spring. We would definitely buy this again if we needed another. Note: Be sure to pay attention to the instructions and do not grasp the sides when expanding the frame. Major pinch hazard- OUCH!
customer_reviews.author: DilbertaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Awesome box spring, super sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this product in general, but especially for anyone who has trouble getting a normal queen sized box spring into an apartment, up a twisty set of stairs, etc. Product arrived quickly, was super easy to set up, and I think it'll last much longer and with greater flexibility than a regular box spring. It's sturdy, attractive, and maneuverable with only one person. I have a basement room in an older house, and had no trouble fitting the collapsed mattress down the stairs and setting it up by myself. Basically, you simply unfold it and zip it up. The hardest part was probably getting it out of the box that it arrived in.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie R. Scott

customer_reviews.title: convenient on two fronts
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace box spring for my parents. Previous box spring was 9 inches plus a 12 inch mattress plus frame height. This created a bed height that was too tall for my aging parents to get in and out of bed comfortably. This reduced the bed height by 5 inches. The Folding design allowed for me to bring upstairs without taking apart banister. (dimensions of stairwell is small) Strong, solid construction. Am happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic design
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a Cal King bed-- all the local stores (small town) said they would have had to order a box spring for the bed so I decided to go on and do that myself. LOVE this easy design. It took no time to figure out how to fold it out and put it in (and I'm not the kind of person who even wants to bother). Super easy. I had looked at another wood version that had to be assembled but this was 100% the better choice. I believe it took maybe 7 minutes to get it into the bed and the box discarded.
customer_reviews.author: KarmaCollar

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate, this product is great!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I purchased this box spring. I was hesitant about how good it would be but I shouldn't have been! When it arrived in the box it looked like it would be way to small for a cal king, then when you unfold it, it all magically pops into place. It is so easy, can be done alone. Perfect for carrying upstairs and round tight corners even in cal king size. The metal frame inside feels strong and sturdy and my mattress sits on it perfectly. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jayde Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Probably better if you back isn't permanently injured.
customer_reviews.text: Okay everything has 5 stars but the reason I give it 3 is because I don't have a bed frame and I have my box springs and mattress laying on the floor. I got this to help my back not hurt and it actually hurts worse (I got injured at work a few years ago.) I'm considering selling these, as they're in perfect condition, and just getting a bed with slats to help my back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect box spring for moving upstairs and through right corners!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect box spring for moving upstairs and through right corners! It came in a small enough package to easily get it up the stairs and around tight corners. Then it assembled easily and it offers great support. Would buy this again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carina Panitzke

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Was nervous at first to get a folding box spring, thinking it was going to not be as sturdy. Had this for a few months now and no issues, seems quite sturdy and holds 2 big people well. Me and my husband are both about 6 feet, I'm 180 lbs and he's 260 lbs, and we haven't had any issues yet.
customer_reviews.author: ARBG

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy! Super easy setup!
customer_reviews.text: First impression, this was soooo easy! Open the box and unfold! Seems sturdy. We will see how it holds up. We have a 10” king size memory foam mattress on top. So much better than having to put something together. The box was small and manageable. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: sundance312

customer_reviews.title: Although I've never seen anything like this before
customer_reviews.text: Although I've never seen anything like this before, it is actually quite sturdy. I am editing my original review and now giving it 5 stars. Comes folded in two.
customer_reviews.author: CHERYL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for foam mattress!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought a Costco Novoform queen mattress that we set on an existing Beautirest box spring base. However the box spring made a creaking noise from the inner springs. We bought this and it was a very easy setup. Note it is just a firm base with no inner springs, exactly what is needed for a foam mattress (we also have a Tempurpedic and the top of its box spring is a solid surface, so this unit approximates it quite well). Highly recommended to those needing a firm base for a foam mattress.
customer_reviews.author: MGM

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This product came in a slim package, but the box spring unfolded completely. It appears to be sturdy and well constructed! Paying a little extra for a fully assembled box spring, rather than paying less and having to put it together was definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Epiphany S. Moon

customer_reviews.title: Very good box springs
customer_reviews.text: Amazing how things have changed since we bought our old box springs. These come folded in a box. Easy to unfold and put in place. They’re great.
customer_reviews.author: morninghill

customer_reviews.title: Only one problem
customer_reviews.text: It is wonderful! Easy to open and put on the frame BUT IT IS HEAVY AND AWKWARD due to the size of the package. There is no way for one person to do this alone. I did but I would not do it again. Very clean, wrapped up nice. If not for the weight I wouldn't have had a proble, M.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Chick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: It took us less than ten minutes to unfold and position each piece. We ordered the king size which came as two twins. Super fast and super user friendly. I slept like a baby the first night. I'd definitely recommend this to anyone who wants a good box spring on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Retailistherapy

customer_reviews.title: Nice BedFrame
customer_reviews.text: This BedFrame came folded in half. When I opened the package it was super simple to setup. I just unfolded and it looks fine. It seems very sturdy. Used it for the Mattress that I also got here through Amazon the Artic Dreams 10'" cooling Gel Mattress. I am very happy with both purchases. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: impatientmiss

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize these were the folding box springs when I purchased them. But I was pleasantly surprised when they unfolded so nicely with covers on. They are very sturdy and I am extremely pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: WhiteSS

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love the box spring. Bought fall size for my daughter ‘s bed. Great quality and no more going back to old fashioned box spring. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better then the old spring type box springs
customer_reviews.text: These box springs are made well and a good value for the money plus it gets delivered right to your door.
customer_reviews.author: KrisTina

customer_reviews.title: A simple and effective box spring.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this folding box spring to use for my daybed. It arrived quickly and all I had to do was unfold it, place it on top of the metal frame and put the mattress on top. My daybed looks so much better now when its made up. My son came for a visit and said he had a very restful sleep on it, you can't ask for more than that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Step above other options for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: It comes in what appears to be a way too small box - but then it just folds out and is ready to put on the bed. Impressive. Make sure you have the room to unfold it because it can get a little awkward if you do not (from experience). Should have realized that I needed the same amount of room as the size I ordered.... So far so good. It is a bit squeaky at first but seems to lessen over time.Been a few months now and it appears to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Mr M

customer_reviews.title: Putting this metal-framed box-spring together was tedious, but uncomplicated
customer_reviews.text: Putting this metal-framed box-spring together was tedious, but uncomplicated. After assembly, it is serving its purpose. I have learned my lesson, and have purchased another type that does not require assembly for my other guess bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I am incredibly happy with this box spring. As a 26 year-old female, I put it together myself, and it was easier than I thought. The packaging and delivery were simple and quick. We have had this box spring for about a month now, and have no complaints. For the money, I think this was a great investment!
customer_reviews.author: Emily CH13

customer_reviews.title: Once assembled it is great
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for and fits great. Only frustration was trying to assemble it but once I did it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: robynl

customer_reviews.title: No assembly required!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy because no assembly was required just removed it from the box, unfolded it, zipped it together and put on my bed frame😊.
customer_reviews.author: Josey

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: it is very good now i wake up with backache from arthritis not a sagging mattress
customer_reviews.author: edith

customer_reviews.title: great frame but dirty cover
customer_reviews.text: I actually love the folding steel frame box spring and would have given it 5 stars plus if possible however, the box spring zip cover came soiled on one side.....looks like a handling problem, perhaps someone with dirty gloves or it was slide across a dirty surface like a floor.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Good basic boxsprings substitute
customer_reviews.text: The price wasn't bad and it wasn't too hard to assemble. If you just need basic boxsprings to hold your mattress and dont mind about 10 mins worth of work its definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: cherish

customer_reviews.title: It was super small when shipped which made it easy to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Incredible buy!!! It was super small when shipped which made it easy to get into my apartment! I carried it myself and it literally folds out in less than 2 minutes. Sturdy and a phenomenal buy! Ive been sleeping on it just fine.
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is maybe my favorite product I've ever bought from Amazon. I got a memory foam mattress with no box spring and a platform bed frame. This box spring added just enough height and made the mattress feel much better (it previously sagged in spots) due to a lack of support from the bed frame. Incredibly easy to assemble and compact shipping! Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Innovative and amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this box spring affordable, but incredibly amazing as well. It is very portable and innovative (because is folds right in half)! It is also every bit as sturdy as I would expect a box spring to be! I am VERY pleased with this purchase! It made moving into a small apartment quite easy!
customer_reviews.author: R. Tilley

customer_reviews.title: Great Box Spring
customer_reviews.text: This box spring was super easy to put together by myself. Its fairly light and works just as any other box spring. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa K

customer_reviews.title: Sets Up in Minutes
customer_reviews.text: Took less than 2 minutes to set up out of the box. Very sturdy. The height of 7.5" is EXACTLY as advertised - unlike some other brands. No tools required, simply open and unfold.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Porter

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Literally open the box, take off the plastic wrap and unfold the 2 pieces (cal king) and theres your box spring! Holds And supports our 12in memory foam mattress very well!!
customer_reviews.author: Daynuh H.

customer_reviews.title: So Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: We love this boxspring! It's metal and sturdy, oh and all you do is unfold it! So glad we got this and it shipped really quickly too!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Holds our 14 inch mattress just fine. No surprises
customer_reviews.text: Met our needs. Didn't know how to get a box spring home locally on a small car. So we decided to try this.. Arrived quickly. Ez unfold. Well built. Holds our 14 inch mattress just fine. No surprises. No complaints. Happy with this and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KB   USA

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product. Would not deal with the old bed foundations ever again (also known as box springs in the old days). Great how this product folds out for instant use. Will be great if ever moving again to transport.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly518

customer_reviews.title: I usually like to but I really wanted to leave on for ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not posted a review in a while, I usually like to but I really wanted to leave on for this box spring because it was INCREDIBLE! I am not the best at putting stuff together and this was the EASIEST thing ever! You literally open the box and just pull it open. It took me 20 seconds, if that. SOOOOOOOOO easy and amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Evan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Exactly what I needed for the Gel Mattress I just purchased
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Narrow hallway? This is your boxed springs.
customer_reviews.text: If you have a narrow stairwell, this is a great product. Kind of tricky getting it set up, but we were able to get there after a couple of attempts. Be careful, lots of pinch-points. Would be nice if t eh cloth cover had a little padding so the mattress didn't slide as much.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money easy to setup, steel enforced heavy duty easy portal and storable box springs. Worth the money and was a steal to be honest , art van was asking for 252 bucks for wooden box springs
customer_reviews.author: Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered!
customer_reviews.text: This product is not what it looks like. I thought I was ordering a traditional box spring but it is a metal platform that a mattress lays on. Very disappointing and totally false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: This works! Light-weight, easy to carry, each piece (2 pieces) folds in half, and now my mattress feels brand new again!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Gobel

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect dimensions
customer_reviews.text: This box spring is described incorrectly. These box spring are for a California king. It is not adaptable for a king size bed. The true dimension are 83×71.5×7.5. Very upset with this purchase. I was totally refunded with free shipping which was gladly appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: The way it opens up is very unique and make it very easy to move around
customer_reviews.text: This box spring is just well designed. The way it opens up is very unique and make it very easy to move around. It is very solid and has a nice cover you only have to zip once opened for a perfect fit. Great product! Could not believe how small the box was shipped and when opened the sizing was dead on.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Franklin

customer_reviews.title: I prefer the old fashion ones
customer_reviews.text: Its ok for the price. I prefer the old fashion ones.
customer_reviews.author: R.S.

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: This mattress foundation was the perfect height and has the sturdiness that I was looking for. It came ready right out of the box and it is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ediva

customer_reviews.title: It folded out very easy, and once assembled it's a extremely sturdy foundation
customer_reviews.text: It folded out very easy, and once assembled it's a extremely sturdy foundation. I'll buy the king size one if they have it for the next bed I purchase
customer_reviews.author: joe kurcaba

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding technology!
customer_reviews.text: This box spring is amazing. When the package showed up I didn't think it was possible however it unfolds outwards and pops up creating a full box spring. Outstanding technology and it's provided a great night's sleep for multiple guests in our guest BR.
customer_reviews.author: Christine & Josh Crowe

customer_reviews.title: worth to buy
customer_reviews.text: replaced my old quirky matress i dont need to worry will wake up my little one when i go to bed
customer_reviews.author: lqycindy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get up a narrow staircase.
customer_reviews.text: For 28 years I had to defer to a double bed - because the box spring would not make the turn upstairs. This was perfectly simple to do so and I now have a queen bed.
customer_reviews.author: julie hillestad

customer_reviews.title: Greatly exceeded our expectations.  Arrived in four days. Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love these split king size mattress box springs in every way. Greatly exceeded our expectations. Arrived in four days. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Baby Boomer

customer_reviews.title: Width is not what they say
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because it said the width was 39 inches. Which we needed. And the width is only 38 inches. We are disappointed in that. It IS however a nice product besides they list the measurements incorrectly.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, very comfortable. Easy to do ( minor assembly; took about 15 minutes).
customer_reviews.author: A.M.H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Just unfold and it's ready to go. Comfortable and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: af

customer_reviews.title: Don’t expect to get it.
customer_reviews.text: We needed this badly (our bed broke when a 5 year old decided to cannonball onto it.) and it never showed. Hugely upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: aaron

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly, my order arrived nearly a week early! 🤗 It was super easy to set up and really supports our mattress well. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Julie petroski

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! The package it arrived in looked like it ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! The package it arrived in looked like it wouldn't work, but this product folded out perfectly. Easy to drag up stairs and put into place.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: quality. price . fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: this mattress is awesome :) so easy to set up . king size comes 1 set =2 piece , i love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble! Perfect! They can be folded back up for easy moving if needed. I’m really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great quality and easy to move
customer_reviews.text: exceeded all expectations. not only good quality, but i could easily bring them up and down the stairs because they fold.
customer_reviews.author: Hoboken Review

customer_reviews.title: quality metal box spring
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the quality of this Box spring. Metal frame feels much more reliable and durable. It folds/unfolds very nicely. when folded, it collapses down to a much thinner size. Easily carried and moved around. Id buy this again if i ever needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike J S

customer_reviews.title: Why had I not engineered something like this myself years ago
customer_reviews.text: This is ingenious. Why had I not engineered something like this myself years ago? So easy to transport and set up. Perfect, sturdy foundation!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Ingeniously compact packaging by design, very easy, quick set-up (five minutes total, including opening the box). Flawless performance and excellent value!
customer_reviews.author: David Michael

customer_reviews.title: This came in the mail and replaced my squeaky old ...
customer_reviews.text: This came in the mail and replaced my squeaky old one. I have had it a year with no troubles.
customer_reviews.author: RDL

customer_reviews.title: ... this for a couple months now and couldn't be happier. It was a dream to setup and its ...
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for a couple months now and couldn't be happier. It was a dream to setup and its held up great. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Katie D

customer_reviews.title: Best one you can get hands down
customer_reviews.text: The best you can buy. Comes in a fair sized box but opens up nice and easy. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: makes a little nose because of the steel but it holds so far.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to unpack and set-up. Seems to work well under a very thick foam mattress.

customer_reviews.title: Spare bedroom....
customer_reviews.text: It works great for an old bed frame and was easy to 'assemble' with another person helping to unfold it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect foundation.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, sturdy support. Came back for a second one, it was just as great.
customer_reviews.author: MrsB

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again! Quality! Ingenious design!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! Ingenious design! Wow! Will buy again! I am so happy I found this product!

customer_reviews.title: Great strong frame
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, arrived fast, seems like it could last a long time.

customer_reviews.title: High quality, low cost
customer_reviews.text: Had this for several months now and it is still sturdy! Don't let the low price fool you, this is a high quality product.

customer_reviews.title: sturdy product.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, sturdy product...this is impressive & a fantastic value for your money. Easy set up!

customer_reviews.title: Easy set-up
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble and light enough for 1 person to handle.

customer_reviews.title: I love this. With they made these years ago when ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this. With they made these years ago when I lived in a town house that we could not fit the box spring up the stairway.
customer_reviews.author: Just a Mom!

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: This is really just an awesome product. When it arrives it is folded in half and maybe 6 or so inches thick. As you unfold it, it rises up and transforms into a normal sized box spring. It's fully assembled; all you have to do is unfold it and then, zip up the fabric. I am so glad I decided to buy this over another one I was considering that was about 50 dollars cheaper and needed to be assembled. Living in a small house with tight corners - this is an ideal product. Honestly, I would buy this over a typical box spring any day.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Gives great support - met my expectations perfectly. Great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna M Rose

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Supports us very well and was super easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Cassondra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Would easily buy this over a regular box spring:). No noise and easy set up and take down:)

customer_reviews.title: ... mistake with a bed bring - this one was great as it folded and then braced to keep it ...
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to make a mistake with a bed bring - this one was great as it folded and then braced to keep it open as it needed to bel
customer_reviews.author: JUDI QUINN

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome box spring set
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome box spring set. I recommend it highly for anyone that ants to raise up a mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Sydnee Mathes

customer_reviews.title: Great product! So easy to set up and quiet
customer_reviews.text: Great product! So easy to set up and quiet!!! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie A

customer_reviews.title: So easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I live alone and I'm not very handy, so I needed something super easy to assemble. I also didn't have high expectations because, ya know, I bought it online. (Who buys their mattress and box spring off Amazon?! Right?!) It was delivered today, and I finally steeled myself and opened the box a couple minutes ago. I can barely put together a chair at IKEA so I didn't have high hopes for myself. HOWEVER, it worked perfectly. Unfold, zip, and flip over onto bedframe. Then I dragged my (Amazon-bought) mattress onto the box spring, flopped down belly first, and low and behold - PERFECT and no squeaking!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Smith

customer_reviews.title: Super light and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Ingenious design. Super light and easy to assemble. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: shshopper

customer_reviews.title: So extremely easy to open - installed in less than 5 minutes
customer_reviews.text: So extremely easy to open - installed in less than 5 minutes. Sturdy and quiet. Really very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Glasser

customer_reviews.title: I love it, and it fit my California bed very ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it ,and it fit my California bed very well!
customer_reviews.author: Solange Nyandambya

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our daughters first big girl bed. Easy to assemble just like other reviewers said.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, quality product for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: No assembling required. Product came looking thin in the box but all you have to do it take it out and it folds up on its own. All you have to do is zip. Amazing, quality product for a reasonable price. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: karoina

customer_reviews.title: and the mattress should be good enough to make the box spring unnoticeable
customer_reviews.text: With a box spring I have never noticed a difference in one type from another. It is a platform, after all, and the mattress should be good enough to make the box spring unnoticeable. This product is quite a bit more expensive than others that were available, but it is all metal, collapsable, and sturdy. For those reasons I though it was worth trying and paying the extra money. I just do not know how a box spring could get 5 stars. A box spring is incapable of claiming a wow factor that would make it stand out so much above the alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rau

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Easy to set up, sturdy and light at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: AvidReader

customer_reviews.title: especially if you like a bit of firmness
customer_reviews.text: It works really well, especially if you like a bit of firmness. Sets up in two minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Dominicci

customer_reviews.title: Best online box spring!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a breeze to set-up and get my son on his new bed. It arrived even earlier than expected, in great condition, completely assembled, and it took only minutes to place on the bed frame. FANTASTIC price at Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Anita L. Lavey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great price, quick delivery, and so easy to get up the stairs and set up!
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: Caution, Caution, Caution. Honest Review.
customer_reviews.text: This item should not be labeled as a "box spring" as it is anything far from it. Basically you have thin, metal rods that run vertical from top to bottom. My husband and I can feel the rods and it makes our mattress feel like it slopes on both sides like a bell-shaped curve. By the way, just purchased our mattress so I know it's not that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this box spring is awesome. Moving, unpacking, construction, price point. Best value. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Best Price Mattress 7.5" New Steel Box Spring/Mattress Foundation-Full
product_meta.description: Style Name:7.5 inch| Size:FullThe innovative 7.5" Bi-fold box spring foundation is for someone wanting the support of a traditional box spring. We the need for easy comfort Both during and before sleep. Unfold your Bi-Fold foundation, lay it upon your bed frame and slide on your chosen mattress and you are ready for a restorative night's sleep. Often times a traditional foundation is not always the most convenient solution. Bi-fold steel box spring offers sturdy support expected of a standard foundation with the utmost ease of mobility. The compact size lowers the risk of nicks & scrapes on furniture and walls in addition, maneuvering traditional box Springs on stairs, small doorways, around corners can be difficult. Bi-fold box spring is the leading foundation in comfort and design, shipping flat also saves on expensive delivery costs.
feature_bullets: No assembly required- remove from box, unfold, and lay your mattress on top
Heavy-duty steel construction with fabric cover
A non-skid fabric in the center helps to keep mattress in place
